programme.title: Just Eat Ep43
programme.desc: In the new culinary show Just Eat, celebrities reveal their favorite chefs and memorable dishes. This series explores how these culinary experiences have impacted their lives, from overcoming personal struggles to finding new career paths. Join us to discover the flavors and stories that resonate with these well-known personalities.

programme.title: Hot Door Night Ep2374
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness Ep105
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan Ep5143
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Bursting Point
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Bang sends Officer Ming undercover to a drug cartel to displace drug lord Yang. A failed raid triggers Yang's rage for revenge. Meanwhile, drug maker Ying Xiu is forced to cooperate with the police and sets a trap for Yang. The battle between the police and the drug cartel has just begun!

programme.title: The Hedgehog
programme.desc: Wang's odd behaviour and quirky ideas make him a social outcast. His teenage nephew Zhou, who is ashamed of his stutter, becomes Wang's only friend. Together, these misfits challenge traditional family expectations and social misunderstandings, supporting and inspiring each other as they seek their own paths in life.

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xings son attempts drug trafficking to save his fathers studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: Grandmaster, The
programme.desc: Directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Wong Kar Wai, this epic action feature begins in Foshan when Ip Man, the martial arts master from the south, takes up a challenge by ageing northern master Gong Yu Tian. Ip Man wins the fight, but is then defeated by Gong Yu Tians daughter Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond

programme.title: An Abandoned Team
programme.desc: Uncle Jia is bad-tempered and lives alone. His forced retirement, failed marriage and strained relationship with his daughter have left him in despair, prompting him to consider ending his life. Fortunately, he is rescued by a stray dog and an animal welfare volunteer, allowing him to rediscover his purpose in life.

programme.title: Bounty Hunters
programme.desc: A group of bounty hunters, including San, Yo, Cat, Swan and Bobo, are tasked to track down the culprit of a series of bombings that have plagued an international hotel group. Unfortunately, Swan, Cat and Bobo are kidnapped by the mastermind of the bombings. Can San and Yo save them? Will the bounty hunters accomplish their mission?

programme.title: My Wife is a Gambling Maestro
programme.desc: Natalie Yao Meng stars as the gambling queen, Ying Ying, who is a contender for the Asian God of Gamblers competition. But before the competition she is betrayed by her fianc and left for dead. Rescued by a young man called Gerrard, who suffering from amnesia, Ying Ying, must recover in time to compete in the big event!

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yong Zhen moves to Shanghai in the hope of becoming rich but ends up having to use his kung fu skills to survive and take revenge against the gang who killed his brother.

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: Hong Kong action cinema is famous for its real kung fu moves performed by a group called Kung Fu Stuntmen. This docu-film pays tribute to the generations of kung fu stuntmen, with the crew spending over two years digging archives and interviewing many talents, including the most prominent masters like Jackie Chan, Donnie Yen and Sammo Hung.

programme.title: Night and Fog
programme.desc: Following The Way We Are, this is based on a true story happening in Tin Shui Wai. It revolves around an older, unemployed Hong Kong man, his young Mainland wife and their two daughters. Their lives, unfortunately, are anything but easy, and the shocking conclusion raises issues about the plight of the socially deprived lower class.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Evas mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mothers wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Evas heart?

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kongs legendary detective?

programme.title: An Abandoned Team
programme.desc: Uncle Jia is bad-tempered and lives alone. His forced retirement, failed marriage and strained relationship with his daughter have left him in despair, prompting him to consider ending his life. Fortunately, he is rescued by a stray dog and an animal welfare volunteer, allowing him to rediscover his purpose in life.

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Lost Love
programme.desc: Mei tries to get over the death of her young son by becoming a foster parent. For 13 years, Meis dedication to the foster child leads her to neglect her husband and the true needs of the child. It is only through the childs unintentional help that the couple finally manages to salvage their relationship.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say yes?

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: Young Chan Lok Kwun accidentally stumbles into the Kowloon Walled City while fleeing, subsequently finding purpose amid chaos and gaining wisdom. Bonding with Shin, Twelfth Master and AV, they unite under Tornado's leadership to defend against the villain, Mr Big's assaults, and pledge to protect the safe haven of the Walled City together.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Middle-aged and retired superhero couple, Huan (Gazer Man) and Red (Aroma Woman), settles into a contented life in a remote village. They find it hard to contain their powers though, and are bored by the uneventful life. When they hear a world martial arts contest is to be held in their village, both are itching to make their long-awaited comeback!

programme.title: Trouble Girl
programme.desc: Xiao Xiao suffers from ADHD and faces bullying in school. Her mother sees her as a troublemaker, while her father toils abroad. The only solace comes from her empathetic teacher, Paul. During a typhoon, Xiao Xiao discovers a secret between her mother and Paul, unravelling complex emotions and shared helplessness in life.

programme.title: Customs Frontline
programme.desc: After boarding an unauthorized cargo ship and finding its entire crew dead, the Hong Kong Customs officers uncover a hidden cache of illegal weapons linked to an international conflict. As Customs officer Zhou Zheng Li and Interpols Ying go undercover, they unveil a multinational operation with ties closer to home.

programme.title: Confinement
programme.desc: Si Ling, a pregnant painter, moves into her dream home after winning an award and hires a confinement nanny. As she begins her one-month confinement after giving birth to her daughter, inexplicable incidents start happening in the house, threatening both her and her baby

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: CJ7
programme.desc: Stephen Chow returns in this hilarious and heartwarming tale of a father and son who discover an adorable alien in the trash.

programme.title: The White Storm 3 Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Billy works undercover in Suchat's drug cartel, while another undercover cop Wing successfully earns their trust in an incident and a brotherly bond is built among the three. When the police busts the syndicate, Suchat flees to the Golden Triangle with Billy and receives a tip-off about the betrayal within his circle of trust

programme.title: Love is the only Answer
programme.desc: At Bo and Cheong wedding reception, the projected was initially showing their journey of love, but suddenly a flash of a clip of Cheong and a sexy girl being intimate came up. Bo calmly ran up to the stage and announced that the wedding is cancelled. The incident rapidly became a hot topic on the internet. Within a year, back to being single again, Bo and the living life happily Cheong maintains a good relationship. One day, Cheong decided to play with love and took Bo to participate in a swinging party. The conservative Bo initially wanted to leave, but after being bribed by Cheong, she helpless and stayed. At the swinging party, the two encounter Kit and his wife Man Lai. The 4 of them develop a romantic and hot relationship... At another wedding reception, when the projector plays the groom and bride's heartwarming clips, a flash of another clip that does not want to be seen comes up...

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Set 500 years before the Monkey King Wu Kong wreaks havoc in the heavenly kingdom, the movie tells the story of how Wu Kong who, unwilling to bow to his own destiny, sets out to rebel against the gods.

programme.title: Crisis Negotiators
programme.desc: Negotiator Wai becomes the prime suspect in a police murder case. He takes hostages at the police station and demands to negotiate with former negotiator Jun. As the two engage in a high-stake battle of wits, their expertise in psychological manipulation leads to a tense verbal sparring match, gradually shifting their positions and mind sets.

programme.title: The Way We Are
programme.desc: Set in Tin Shui Wai, a marginalised satellite town, Kwai is a middle-aged widow who works hard in a neighbourhood supermarket to support herself and her son. They lead a mundane but fulfilling life. When an elderly woman who lives alone moved in to Tin Shui Wai, Kwai strikes up a friendship with her and helps her ease into a new life.

programme.title: Go for Broke
programme.desc: A ruthless drug trafficking group has destroyed countless families due to drug addiction, including Zhang Yao's family. Vowing to take revenge, Zhang Yao teams up with Detective An to take down the drug lords. As their revenge plot unfolds, do they share a common foe or harbour personal agendas?

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kongs ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bats knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: The Lovers Blades, a pair of invincible weapons, are to be delivered to the Qing Emperor. However, they accidentally fell into the hands of Xiao Zhong Hui and Yuan Guan Nan, so Imperial Chief Zhuo Tian Xiong hunts them down for the blades. As the battle begins, the secret of the blades are also revealed.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman and coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: Governor Yan is killed and his guard Fan identifies Kou as the assassin by his signature weapon, a dart. Kou is listed as a wanted man when he enters the city, but managed to escape arrest with the help of the innkeepers daughter. At the same time, Fan is attacked by a bandit who pretends to be Kou. What are the secret plots behind these attacks?

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Threatened by the Yuan who are closing in to rule the whole of China, a band of Song survivors band together to save their prime minister. This bold and fearless heroes fighting for their cause are led by international star, Lo Lieh (Glass Tears, Killer Clans) and Shi Szu (Lovers Destiny), who must fight their way out of trap after trap. But they can't escape them all, and eventually the two end up in prison... it is either death or a fight to the end!

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A Japanese karate master and Diao Er, who has been expelled from his martial arts school, return to the school to kill the school master and his disciples. After the massacre, disciple Lei Ming embarks on a vigorous training regime and vows to avenge their deaths. A fatal battle is about to begin

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperors sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hong escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hong for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hong escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sisters wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. Another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Lin finally battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: The Imperial Tomb Raiders
programme.desc: The story revolves around a maverick, a band of woman warriors and a group of ruthless bandits. The maverick teams up with the woman warriors to battle the bandits seeking to raid the emperors tomb.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Heaven and Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: Dawn will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parents consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her

programme.title: Heroes of the East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: The legendary hero Wu Sung is sent to a prison in Meng province after murdering his adulterous sister-in-law and her lover. While in prison, the officer Shih En spares Wu the humiliating baton punishment. Owing Shih a favour, Wu decides to help Shih get his restaurant back at all costs when it was forcefully taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: The Kingdom and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: Swift Sword
programme.desc: A righteous swordsman, Bai Yi Pang, seeks revenge on an evil clan but is crippled after being beaten up by them. Years later, a young man encounters Bai who is hiding in a cave. Bai decides to teach this determined young man his Swift Sword skills so that he can help Bai take revenge on the evil clan.

programme.title: Call of the Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yus beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the Tsai Li Fu style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return

programme.title: Swordswomen Three
programme.desc: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon could be called "Swordswomen Two." Three decades earlier, Shen Yi, Essie Lin Chia, and Pan Ying-tzu took on Shaw's first international superstar, Lo Lieh for the Han Family Sword - making this a four-star treat for action fans.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperors death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Liu serves his triad society loyally and tries to live a respectable life, but over time his good intentions lead him to an all-out gang war with a startling conclusion.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma S1 Ep93

programme.desc: Back In Black - When Daniel starts teaching his first karate students, he questions whether he can fill Mr. Miyagis shoes. Johnny invents some unorthodox training methods with help from an unlikely source.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Fire And Ice - Daniel pulls out all the stops in an effort to recruit new students to Miyagi Do. Johnny reflects on some of the major relationships in his life - and responds to Daniels promotional efforts with his own.

programme.title: The Nanny Diaries
programme.desc: A recent college graduate takes on a nannying job in a snobby New York penthouse that requires more parenting than she could have ever imagined.

programme.title: Chicago Med S10 Ep14
programme.desc: Acid Test - Gaffney gets a surprise visit from a National Accreditation Board of Hospitals representative. Hannah and Naomi search for the cause of a young girls infection. Lenox and Frost work together to save the victim of an accidental shooting.

programme.title: Chicago Med S10 Ep15
programme.desc: Down In A Hole - Ripley struggles to rescue a woman and her daughter trapped in an abandoned well. Frost is caught off guard by the arrival of an old friend from his TV days. Hannahs big sister gives her some much needed good news.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S12 Ep143

programme.title: Deadline Ep1
programme.desc: James Alden is a washed-up journalist making trashy documentaries when he lands the interview of the decade. Natalie Varga is suspected of murdering her rich Hungarian husband and she makes James an offer - find the killer and she'll give him the exclusive everyone wants.

programme.title: Deadline Ep2
programme.desc: Oliver went on the run after borrowing from drug dealers in Budapest. Mrs Molnar provides a Hungarian police file which implicates him in another murder attempt. He's officially dead from a drugs overdose and their mother identified the body.

programme.title: Deadline Ep3
programme.desc: James has a terrifying flight to Budapest where he discovers it's very easy to kill someone on a plane. He manages to evade Toth and Barbara joins him to track down Vera. Vera denies knowing Oliver is alive and threatens to report them for harassment.

programme.title: Deadline Ep4
programme.desc: James returns to London to pursue the killer but Barbara has fired him from his job and no-one believes his stories of what happened in Budapest. When he refuses to drop the case the police arrest him.

programme.title: The Switch
programme.desc: Jennifer Aniston and Jason Bateman star in a charming, offbeat romantic comedy about best friends who accidentally become closer than they ever expected when one of them decides to have a baby.

programme.desc: Lena Headey - Actress Lena Headey joins Bear on a 48-hour expedition through the steep cliffs and icy waters of Spain's Iberian Peninsula. Can she handle the punishing conditions?

programme.title: Big Cats 24/7 S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The team witnesses a baby boom in the Delta; lioness Matho protects her cubs while the leopard Xudum reveals her newborns as danger looms nearby.

programme.title: Griff's Great Kiwi Road Trip S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Griff Rhys Jones' journey across NZ using only the back roads sees him travel from Queenstown, over The Remarkables, and finishes his trip at the very tip of the country, Bluff.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Series 1 - In Hong Kong, an old WII detention centre is transformed into a gleaming new university, while respecting the old buildings beneath. And in Wisconsin, USA, and old polluting power station is stripped down and re-engineered into a spacious student facility.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Lena Headey - Actress Lena Headey joins Bear on a 48-hour expedition through the steep cliffs and icy waters of Spain's Iberian Peninsula. Can she handle the punishing conditions?

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Linear Oasis - Follow the course of South Africas Orange river from its origins to where it spills out into the Atlantic Ocean. Along the way we encounter a diverse range of habitats and the creatures they support, from the dry lands of the Richtersveld to the beauty of Augrabies; this is the story of the Linear Oasis. We reveal how life is adapted to survive along its course and discover a rich world of plants and animals.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A New Zealand Christmas - See how one animal familys tragedy is anothers holiday dinner as New Zealands mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk S1 Ep4
programme.desc: India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day - Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean - Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Australian Spring Fever - Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs - Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Animals at Play S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Power of Playtime - Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: Tap into one of the least understood areas of animal science: sleep. Check out adaptations made by the most extreme snoozers on Earth, from tiny bees who doze for 20 hours a day to enormous elephants who survive on just two precious hours of rest.

programme.title: Wild Survivors S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Animal Allure - The drive to reproduce is one of natures most primal forces. And with over a hundred thousand animal species in Africa, countless strategies have evolved. Discover how the residents of Zambias Luangwa Valley strive to pass on their genes.

programme.title: Wild Survivors S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Animal Appetites - With food scarce during the dry season in Zambias Luangwa Valley, each species has evolved its own strategy to make the most of scarce resources. From grazers to predators, learn the tactics that help Africas animals eat and avoid being eaten.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Littlest Cub - Get to know Winston, a tiny abandoned cub who imprints on Judy as she nurses him 24-7. Feel the heartbreak as she severs their emotional attachment and teaches this sweet little fellow how to be a grown-up, independent bear in the non-human world.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Meet the X-Girls - Welcome sisters Xiba, Xyla, and Xola, a trio of starving orphans who turn Winstons world upside down before gentle Xola teaches him a lesson about friendship. Then monitor new cubs Yasmine and Yara, who get reacquainted after a stressful separation.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Becoming a Bear - Bone up on outdoor skills as Winston and the X girls move into their new fresh-air enclosure, and witness Yasmine and Yaras kindergarten power struggle. Then look over restless yearling Victor, whose sudden limp pushes back his release date.

programme.title: Animals at Play S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Power of Playtime - Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: Tap into one of the least understood areas of animal science: sleep. Check out adaptations made by the most extreme snoozers on Earth, from tiny bees who doze for 20 hours a day to enormous elephants who survive on just two precious hours of rest.

programme.title: Wild Survivors S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Animal Allure - The drive to reproduce is one of natures most primal forces. And with over a hundred thousand animal species in Africa, countless strategies have evolved. Discover how the residents of Zambias Luangwa Valley strive to pass on their genes.

programme.title: Wild Survivors S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Animal Appetites - With food scarce during the dry season in Zambias Luangwa Valley, each species has evolved its own strategy to make the most of scarce resources. From grazers to predators, learn the tactics that help Africas animals eat and avoid being eaten.

programme.title: Nature Scenes: Gros Morne Waterfalls S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Gros Morne Waterfalls - One half hour of uninterrupted footage from Gros Morne National Park. Fly over the edge of 600 metre high cliffs to discover some of the worlds tallest waterfalls up close.

programme.title: Nature Scenes: Island Vistas S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Islands in Mexico, South America, and Bahamas - Islands in Mexico, South America, and Bahamas

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Meet the X-Girls - Welcome sisters Xiba, Xyla, and Xola, a trio of starving orphans who turn Winstons world upside down before gentle Xola teaches him a lesson about friendship. Then monitor new cubs Yasmine and Yara, who get reacquainted after a stressful separation.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Becoming a Bear - Bone up on outdoor skills as Winston and the X girls move into their new fresh-air enclosure, and witness Yasmine and Yaras kindergarten power struggle. Then look over restless yearling Victor, whose sudden limp pushes back his release date.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Stork Pack in Trouble - Agonize over a lost Stork pack puppy, and tussle with Manzi pups who are sorting their place in the hierarchy, figuring out noisy-neighbor friends and foes. Hop on a search mission with Julz for the missing Kakuli pack in the desolate Badlands.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule the World S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Insect Apocalypse - Look at what a global insect decline could do to our planet. Uncover our historical dependence on these tiny animals, the vital roles they play in our ecosystems, and the reasons why our fragile relationship to them is in danger worldwide.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule the World S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life Givers - Learn how bees, butterflies, moths, and other pollinators keep our fields and forests fruitful, and weigh what life would be like if these busy bugs vanished. Witness a mysterious butterfly pilgrimage and a moths clever way of escaping hungry bats.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Wild West - Complete the trips final lap in the untamed lands where Australias interior desert meets the hot, hostile Indian Ocean. Confront the challenges of survival in this region as Lizzie dives with tiger sharks, manta rays, and nomadic turtles.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Road to Independence - As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Berenty Dynasty - The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Jungle Killers - A jaguar stalks the riverbank. A venomous snake is on the move. A Colombian tarantula waits for night fall. Watch as these fierce predators prowl through the jungle and bite into their next great meal.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun - Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.desc: Big Cats, Big Trouble - Dodge a leopard with the Manzi dogs while they treat themselves to a stolen feast. No such luck for the Kakuli pack on the hunt, as theyre foiled by a brave puku antelope. Find the stork pack, and retreat from charging elephants with Jules and Simon.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Road to Independence - As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Seasonal Shores - Strap in for a thrilling ride as Lizzie travels by air, land, and sea to meet Alaskan wildlife and visit the worlds remotest corners. Eavesdrop on underwater Arctic residents with scientists, dine with polar bears, and scavenge with bald eagles.

programme.title: Arabian Seas S1 Ep5
programme.desc: A Turtle's Legacy - The sea turtle is one of the oldest animals on earth. These ancient mariners even pre-date the dinosaurs. They have existed, relatively unchanged, for over 100 million years. But now, all seven of the surviving species are endangered.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Lost World of the Yucatan - Dive under Mexicos Yucatn rainforest into an elaborate network of flooded caves called cenotes. Learn how underground rivers feed the waterless surface on their way to the sea, supporting legions of bats, howler monkeys, and more curious species.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Jungle Love - Its not easy to fall in love in the jungle. Find out how these animals turn to strategic mating strategies in order to pass on their genes. Meet monkeys who like monogamy, a bird who rivals Casanova, and a spider wholl risk his life for love.

programme.title: Wild Crusades S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Search for the Secret Bear - The forests of Yala National Park are home to the enigmatic sloth bear. Shy by nature, this animal is seldom seen and rarely filmed. Join a team of wildlife filmmakers as they reveal this mysterious bears life and behaviour as never seen before.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep13
programme.desc: Moosebumps!: Chapter Four - When Fearless Leader uses the monster Humongalon to force everyone to surrender the world to him, Rocky and Bullwinkle try to stop them in the most massive monster battle ever

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep1
programme.desc: A New Bergen-Ning / Laugh Out Cloud - Poppy throws a party to urge the Trolls and Bergens to build friendship When Troll Village has a drought Cloud Guy offers to wash away the problem after some quality time with Branch.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep3
programme.desc: Royal Review / Funishment - Poppy faces her first royal review as Queen and sets out to ensure 100 happiness in Troll VillagePoppy must figure out how to handle crime in Troll Village when Cooper steals a pie.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep5
programme.desc: Jin's New Look - On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctors coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Mortys five babies.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep6
programme.desc: A Cabbage Kinda Day - Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Mortys babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but its too much and she accidentally loses Mini-Morty. Shes going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Legend Of The Boneknapper Ep1
programme.desc: Legend Of The Boneknapper Dragon - Hiccup and the gang join Gobber on a quest to find a legendary boneknapper dragon.

programme.title: Gift Of The Night Fury Ep1
programme.desc: Dragons:Gift Of The Night Fury - As the village of Berk prepares for its winter holiday, the resident dragons all inexplicably fly away.

programme.title: Book Of Dragons Ep1
programme.desc: Book Of Dragons - Join Hiccup and his friends as they explore and add to their primary reference about dragons.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Dragon Racers Ep1
programme.desc: Dawn Of The Dragon Racers - The "How to Train Your Dragon" adventure continues when a hunt for lost sheep turns into a fierce, fun-filled competition.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep8
programme.desc: Into the Belly of the Den of the House of the Nest of Cats - Mom tries to help Tim get over his fear of the neighborhood crazy-cat-lady

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep9
programme.desc: Spirit Day - Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep10
programme.desc: Par Avion - When Mega Fat tries to get Boss Baby fired while on an airplane to Pairs, Tim and Staci must prevent a baby meltdown

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep4
programme.desc: What Goes Eep Must Come Dawn - After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep5
programme.desc: Parental Stridence - When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep6
programme.desc: The Flopping of the Bullruses - Ugga has a secret - she's taking Eep to "flop with the bulrusses" - a fun and dangerous pastime Ugga enjoyed as a teen. Ugga's excitement fades when Hope invites herself and Dawn along.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep8
programme.desc: Toad-al Recall - A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crews life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items but Jin and Peng arent so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toads magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep2
programme.desc: First Flight: Part 2 - Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep43
programme.desc: The Dragon Knights Part 2 - There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep1
programme.desc: A Cause for The Paws - Po, at the top of his game but lonely, comes across two weasels stealing an earthquake causing gauntlet and tries to stop them, but inadvertently destroys a town. He loses his title as Dragon Master and teams up with Wandering Blade, a knight on a mission from England, to track down the weasels and get his title back.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep2
programme.desc: The Knights Code - Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep8
programme.desc: Into the Belly of the Den of the House of the Nest of Cats - Mom tries to help Tim get over his fear of the neighborhood crazy-cat-lady

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep4
programme.desc: Bad News Bergens / Unhealthy Competition - Poppy signs the Trolls up for a game of Bergenball with the toughest Bergen team aroundSmidge and Guy Diamond face off in a competition for juice dominance.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep11
programme.desc: The Poppy Horror Picture Show / Dinkles Dinkles Little Star - After hearing a scary story Poppy tries to help Biggie get over his fearsHoping to enhance Mr. Dinkles selfconfidence Biggie enters him into a Bergen pet show.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep22
programme.desc: Scimitar - While searching for items missing from the treasure house, Puss enlists the help of the Scimitar, an evil sword that turns its wielder wicked.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep26
programme.desc: No - Puss in Boots returns to San Lorenzo at the behest of Dulcinea, to flush out an imposter masquerading as the town's protector.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep28
programme.desc: Sullen Earth - When the Mole King kidnaps Uli, Puss realizes that confidence alone isn't always enough ammunition to defeat a powerful army

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep32
programme.desc: Escape Goat - Dulcinea and the entire town must save the day after Puss attempts to rescue Uli with the help of El Guante Blanco, Golem, Goodsword and the Dutchess.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep3
programme.desc: It's A Secret / Queen Of Thighs - Oh cannot keep a secret when Tip tells him she's planning a surprise party/Lucy's Queen of Thighs video goes viral and turns her into a celebrity.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep4
programme.desc: Krunkle Krush / Beauty Tip - Tip spies on Oh when he has his first date with a strange Boov named Krunkle./Tip competes against rival Pom Pom Pappernacky in a beauty pageant.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep3
programme.desc: Bumperdome / Broaches - A near-accident gives Chet his first adrenaline rush, and in his quest for another he enters a dangerous race inside a pinball machine. // The FAST team must work together to keep a group of sewer surfing roaches from entering the taco stand so that Tito can pass his health inspection.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep4
programme.desc: African Queen / Mega Snails - The FAST crew is tricked into going to Africa by the Queen of the Banana Slugs for a dangerous journey through the plains in order to save her tribe. // White Shadow is challenged by three over-zealous and over-sized championship sumo wrestler snails to an outrageous wrestling match.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep28
programme.desc: Speed - Ty can't stop rolling after Skrap-It steals his master cylinder, so the Trux must quickly figure out a fix before he falls off the edge of a cliff

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep29
programme.desc: Pea Dummy / Mary Anning - When Peabody and Sherman take an intelligence test, Peabody can't believe he scores much lower than Sherman and desperately tries to figure out why

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep2
programme.desc: Disarmed & Dangerous / Frankenleftovers - Disarmed and Dangerous When Mantha's arm falls off, her replacement limb turns out to be a monstrous tentacle! Frankenleftovers Casper gets a seemingly impossible class assignmentto create life!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep28
programme.desc: The Case Of The Broken Xylophone Bridge - Everyone is enjoying playing games on Toy Green but when Noddy and Big Ears come back from apple picking at the farm they discover someone, or something, has broken a key on the xylophone bridge. Noddy needs to investigate! With the help of Bumpy and Revs and using the wwwbook to gather clues, Noddy discovers that someone has tried to fix it with purple sticky tape. If he can find out who uses purple sticky tape he might discover who broke the key. The trail leads him to Smartysaurus, who broke the bridge by mistake when she was playing bowling. Noddy and Deltoid show the big dinosaur how to play the game without breaking anything else. Good job, Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep2
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Giant Pumpkin - Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep80
programme.desc: Pip And The Genie - Fifi has too much to do as usual. Stingo offers to help with some of her jobs in exchange for a pie. He then tricks Pip into believing that he has a magic lamp, and will give it to Pip if he does Fifi's jobs for him

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep28
programme.desc: Littlest Laugh - Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo are trying to find out who is the funniest animal in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. But they soon realise that they are much funnier when they are together.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! Ep29
programme.desc: Tail to the Chief / Chaser and Chewer: Part Chew - When Tag volunteers to be Mayor for the day, she promises everyone an ice cream party. But as she tries to do everything herself, the party plans begin to fall apart. Until Tag realizes that being a great Mayor means knowing when to ask for help. / Comic book villains Flea and Thunder (aka Frank and Beans) have teamed up with a Wicked Chicken to cause chicken-related havoc on Pawston. Heroes Chaser and Chewer (aka Tag and Scooch), team up with Flora Fedora (Lady Lydia) to save the town.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep3
programme.desc: Little Sisters / Tricky Treasure - Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. They play and become friends. / The unicorns are eager to play with a new mystery item that washes up on the beach, but what is it? While the other unicorns come up with imaginative ideas of what it could be, Pixie is determined to find out exactly what it is.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep21
programme.desc: Plushythingy - When Frederic Estes creates the cutest plushy ever that is the hottest toy in town, the field team must destroy the last remaining one but are powerless against its cuteness

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep8
programme.desc: Daddy Daughter Day - Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldnt be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eeps traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isnt until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes its time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep11
programme.desc: Wu You Gonna Call? - After the reveal of magical creatures existence and Yis magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the citys citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their creature awareness message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS Ep8
programme.desc: Magma Breather - Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and DAngelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep21
programme.desc: Weekend at Diamonds / Brancheption - Guy creates a new invention, the Farty Party/When Branch is trapped in a dream by a mysterious critter called the Dream Sucker, he must find a way to escape

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep15
programme.desc: Gratitude - When Phoebes Gratitude Day card flies away before she can give it to Marcus, the Dews try to help her recreate it - perfectly. But they learn that you don't have to be perfect to show your gratitude for someone. / When Athena finds herself a little short-handed at the Fairhaven Summer Fair, her cousin, Reed, comes to help; only to give Athena more problems to fix.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep16
programme.desc: Dew Glue / Dew Believer - When Harpers ceramic dragon is smashed, the Dews must find all the pieces. But when a piece ends up missing, the Dews work together to create a new piece, hoping no one will notice. / Dylan goes to great lengths to invite his Dew Drop to his soccer game but, in the process, learns that sometimes believing in something is more powerful than seeing something.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep19
programme.desc: Rodney the Hero / Club Shed - When Rodney accidentally catches Sam when she falls from a tree and starts to believe hes a hero TZG secretly follow him around town to make sure his clumsy hero-ing doesnt go wrong. / When Lula and Luis want a clubhouse for the Squasher Fan Club, TZG secretly help fix up the shed in Luis backyard.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep20
programme.desc: It Takes a Zenko / What a Racket - When various townsfolk report having lost soft belongings, TZG secretly investigates to discover thieving pigeon Yolanda had been building a nest for baby gophers. / When Ians lucky badminton racket goes missing, TZG secretly finds and returns it in time for a rematch against his toughest opponent.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep15
programme.desc: Double Finked - Magnus's nephew, Axel, arrives on the island and tells the Rescue Riders that he wants to join their team. But is he just a trickster like his uncle?

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep16
programme.desc: Divewings - When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep15
programme.desc: Best Friends Day / The White Whale - Pixie loves to ride the clouds, but she can't understand why Kelp doesnt love it, too. If they don't agree on this, does that mean they're not best friends anymore? / Kelp helps Ollie fulfill his dream of watching the white whale migration.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep16
programme.desc: Shark and Pilot Fish / Theo - When shark and pilot fish are separated its up to Kelp, Scallop, Cruz, and Waverly to help them find each other again. / Scallops friend Theo finally comes clean on why hes always rushing off.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep41
programme.desc: Lucky and the Flight of the Fancy - Lucky, Julian and Aunt Cora get swept away in Julians new hot air balloon and must fend for themselves in the wilderness

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep42
programme.desc: Lucky and the Jam Jam - The PALs try to figure out why Marciela is acting so weird, while Miradero is gripped by April Fools Day fever

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep41
programme.desc: In Dreams - When Puss asks the second witch sister Malaranea for her gem, she casts a spell that makes him a prisoner in his dreams and only Dulcinea can save him

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep42
programme.desc: Fluteus Maximus - When Puss approaches the third witch sister Maliflua, he discovers she is actually the Piper and that a fourth witch is much closer than ever imagined

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep43
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Abandoned Artifact Of The Absentee Aliens - After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep44
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Hazardous Hysteria Of The Hangry Hypnosinger - Everybody on the spaceship has been cryogenically frozen for three months everyone, that is, except Krupp, who's wide awake and happily in charge.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep21
programme.desc: Mom for a Day / Kitty in the City - When Mom is sick on a busy day at home, Tag offers to pick up the slack and take on her tasks for the day. Tag handles it at first, but when the responsibilities start to stack up, she realizes that being Mom is much harder than she thought. \ Tag and Scooch are excited to get to know Kit, who has organized a bunch of cat-ivities for the day. But when Kit realizes she accidentally scratched up Frank and Beanss tree, she, Tag and Scooch find a way to make it up to them.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep21
programme.desc: She Said, She Said / Starfish - When one of Rikkis plants won't sing, Pixie and Juniper both tell their varying recollections of why the plant is suddenly silent. / Kelp, Scallop, and Cruz have always thought that starfish did nothing but laze about; but as they go about their day, the starfish goes through his own routine, completely unbeknownst to everyone else.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep11
programme.desc: Cat Cop! - When baby families are leaving town, Boss Baby and Tim battle to prove Bootsy is behind it all

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep13
programme.desc: Six Well-Placed Kittens - When Bootsy's plan of 6 strategically placed kittens brings the whole town down, Mega Fat is forced to team with Boss Baby

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Frenzied Farts of Flabby Flabulous - George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep1
programme.desc: Sticky Business - Struggling to find their purpose on the Betterman farm, the Croods see an opportunity to prove their worth by harvesting Phils perilous (and sticky) bounceberries.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep2
programme.desc: Guy Time - When Eep wants alone time with her new friend Dawn, Guy seeks a new friend of his own and finds an unlikely companion in Thunk.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep11
programme.desc: Wu You Gonna Call? - After the reveal of magical creatures existence and Yis magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the citys citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their creature awareness message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep12
programme.desc: The Ditch Sitch - The crew gets their first ping on their new creature-helping app! A dried up jellyfish-type creature has been discovered at a construction site, and the anti-creature contractor wants it GONE. The crew try taking Jelleen to the sewers to live with Sewer Koi, but the unhappy creature creates a blackout in the sewers with its magical electric charge. Realizing that Jelleen should be able to stay in her original home, the crew must stand up against the contractor and force her to see the error of her ways or else!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep13
programme.desc: Tales from the Fox's Tails - When a mysterious creature keeps stealing peoples prized possessions, the crew discovers the Nine-Tailed Fox, a trickster rooted in Chinese lore. Unbeknownst to Yi, she is taken on a realm-bending journey by NTF so that the Fox might pry away Yis prized violin. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep3
programme.desc: The Lotus - Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep5
programme.desc: The Gateway to The Desert - A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep6
programme.desc: Kung Boov / Werewolves Of Chicago - Tip teaches Oh her version of kung fu so he can stand up to a bully/Oh finds a real wolf to teach him how to become a werewolf for Halloween.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep5
programme.desc: Ants Ants Revolution / Clamsquatch - A group of fire ants swarm the city and it's up to Burn to race their leader in order to get them to leave. However, a worried Chet gets in the way. // The crew travels to Mississippi for a race in the swamp. When Skidmark goes missing, they fear he has been taken by a creepy mythological creature.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep6
programme.desc: Turbo Stinks / Snails In Jail - On the day Turbo unveils a new cologne he has created, birds suddenly start attacking the city and it's up to the crew to figure out how to get rid of the feathery menaces before anyone gets eaten/Travelling through the desert to visit a kid snail who is sick, the crew runs afoul of a villainous sheriff who puts them in jail until Turbo agrees to throw a race.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep29
programme.desc: Flynt - Ty gets jealous when a Hydrodon named Flynt becomes everyone's new hero, but when a blazing fire heads towards the ravine, Ty must ask Flynt for help

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep30
programme.desc: Climate Control / Ziryab - When Hobson gives Peabody and Sherman a weather-controlling device, they can't agree on a temperature and cause a massive storm flood in the Penthouse

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep3
programme.desc: Bully For You / The Ra Animator - Bully For You When Casper decides he can't take any more of Thatch's nastiness, he forms a secret squad dedicated to putting an end to bullying. The Ra-minator Using the power of invisibility, Casper offers to help transform Ra from a sports zero to an athletic hero.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep140
programme.desc: Very Hot Day - It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep141
programme.desc: Chloe's Puppet Show - Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloe's house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep142
programme.desc: Daddy Gets Fit - Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep170
programme.desc: Fruit Surprise - When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep171
programme.desc: New Blue Jeans - Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Fruit Chews / Opera Cake - Henrys in a Snail Race! But Chef's fruit chews for Henry's mid-race snack are taking too long to set! // After learning Ruby is an amazing opera singer, Chef tries to bake a delicate Opera cake.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Apple Pie - Tiny Chef bakes apple pie for the big contest, and after an accident, has to think fast to come up with a new entry.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Sneezing Cold - Gabby, Blaze and AJ are out in the wilderness when they get a call, Blaze's friends have come down with a sickness called the Sneezles!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Robot Power - When Crusher unleashes three of his most destructive creations on Axle City, there's only one hero strong enough to save the day: Robot Blaze!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1123
programme.desc: Fire Rescue: Pups Save A Baby Goat Birthday / Fire Rescue: Pups Save A S'more-Mergency - Farmer Yumi and Al's baby goat birthday party goes up in flames. // Humdinger goes camping, he has just one thing on his mind: s'mores.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1122
programme.desc: Fire Rescue: Pups Save the Flaming Flounder / Fire Rescue: Pups Make the News - Francois' pants catch on fire, sending the Lighthouse & Flounder in flames. // A news crew is in town when Chickaletta accidentally causes a fire in new parkette.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Fixes A Squeak - There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep220
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Post Office / The Crew Builds A Super Farm Animal Wash - Builder Cove needs a post office! But when construction gets squirrely, it's up to the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep221
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Winter Wonderland / The Crew Builds A Giant Snow Squirrely Whirly - Rubble & Crew work together to transform Builder Cove's beach boardwalk into a bright, festive winter wonderland.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Tiny Dancer / The Sleepy Sun - Dora shows the twins a music box with a baila folklorico dancer who comes to life! Bailarina's adelita boots run away, so we need to get them back.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Whale Songs / Tell-Tale Scooter - Hank gets a bad case of stage fright when his dad asks him to sing a song in the Whale Choir. // Baby Shark accidentally breaks William's new scooter and hides the evidence.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep209
programme.desc: The Sharkdog Scoop - When Mom is assigned to investigate Sharkdog's wild side for the news, she realizes there's nothing scary about Max's best friend.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The Party Animal - When Sharkdog accidentally destroys the boardwalk, Max and Sharkpack must prove to everyone that Sharkdog is a really great pet.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Working Like a Sharkdog - All Sharkdog wants to do is play with his new toy, but when Dad ends up on a wild adventure through town, Sharkdog must give up his playtime and come to Dad's rescue.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep143
programme.desc: Tidying Up - Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep144
programme.desc: The Playground - Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa's friends are also there. Peppa likes going on the swings but George does not because he's scared of heights.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep145
programme.desc: Daddy Puts Up a Picture - Daddy Pig offers to put up a picture of Peppa and George on the wall while Mummy Pig is out. He accidentally cracks the wall while doing it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep146
programme.desc: At the Beach - Peppa and her family go to the beach, and they do lots of things there including burying Daddy Pig in the sand. When it's time to go they almost leave without Daddy Pig as he has fallen asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep148
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Boat - Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep149
programme.desc: Shopping - Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep150
programme.desc: My Birthday Party - It is Peppa's birthday, and Peppa has a party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep151
programme.desc: Daddy's Movie Camera - Daddy gets a new video camera. First, Peppa shows him how to work it, and then he records Peppa being silly.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen - Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup - The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Paddington's Earth Day Mission / Paddington's Special Spring Harvest Celebration - It'd Earth Day and Paddington has the important job of planting a tree, but will he find the perfect spot before it is too late?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep714
programme.desc: Pickleworld! - It's Pickleworld! The coolest, most pickle-riffic theme park in ALL of Axle City. Too bad Pickle's family got lost on the way there!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1123
programme.desc: Fire Rescue: Pups Save A Baby Goat Birthday / Fire Rescue: Pups Save A S'more-Mergency - Farmer Yumi and Al's baby goat birthday party goes up in flames. // Humdinger goes camping, he has just one thing on his mind: s'mores.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1122
programme.desc: Fire Rescue: Pups Save the Flaming Flounder / Fire Rescue: Pups Make the News - Francois' pants catch on fire, sending the Lighthouse & Flounder in flames. // A news crew is in town when Chickaletta accidentally causes a fire in new parkette.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Best Finemies / Dinner with Bentley - When Baby and Shadow accidentally break a music box, the two unlikely partners team up to fix it. // The Sharks turn their home into a fancy restaurant to impress a snobby dinner guest.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Vandal! / Tumbles, Where Did You Go? - Barbidur catches a mysterious masked vandal. // Tototutu, Barbidur's favorite little car, has mysteriously disappeared.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Paddington the Rare Bear and Mr.Brilliant / Paddington and the Accidental Hero - Windsor Gardens has two new heroes - Mr Brilliant and Rare Bear, but will Jonathan and Judy be impressed? // Jonathan is hailed a hero after saving a rare gnome.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep209
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Ferris Wheel / The Crew Builds A Farm Animal Yoga Space - Rubble & Crew want to give Grocer Gabriel the best beach day ever... including a ride on a brand new Ferris wheel at the boardwalk!

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Tiny Dancer / The Sleepy Sun - Dora shows the twins a music box with a baila folklorico dancer who comes to life! Bailarina's adelita boots run away, so we need to get them back.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep415
programme.desc: The Flying Lion - Blaze and AJ are excited to play with their new friend Roarian, the Flying Lion! But when Roarian loses his magical sunstone, he turns into a statue!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Celery & Hummus / Lettuce Wraps - Chef, Olly, Ruby and Henry compete in the annual Celeryjack Games. But Chef, who's used to winning, faces stiff competition this year.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep204
programme.desc: A Not So Grand Opening - When Sharkdog accidentally eats the aquarium's newest exhibit, Max and the Sharkpack must come up with a plan before Mr. Ceviche, the aquarium's owner, catches on.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The Fast and The Fishy - Max is determined to win this year's obstacle course race, but that may be difficult with Sharkdog always trying to help.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Big Picture - Sharkdog is very excited to be in the annual Fisher family photo, but disaster after disaster threatens his perfect picture.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Deep Dark Disco / Finception - The Sharks help Wavey Jones find his disco ball so he can throw a jaw-some party. // When Hank accidentally takes an important treasure from Swimmy Hall, he goes on a sneaky mission to set things right.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Busy Baby - Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1123
programme.desc: Fire Rescue: Pups Save A Baby Goat Birthday / Fire Rescue: Pups Save A S'more-Mergency - Farmer Yumi and Al's baby goat birthday party goes up in flames. // Humdinger goes camping, he has just one thing on his mind: s'mores.
