programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep221
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Snow Squirrely Whirly - When a snow day gets in the way of Motor & Mix's Super Squirrely Whirly plans, Rubble & Crew do what they do best... build!

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Little Axolotl / Bubble Trouble - Dora and Boots find an adorable baby axolotl. They have to bring him home, but he keeps wandering off. // The Big Red Chicken gets stuck in a giant floating bubble.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Making Bread / From One Pit to Another - Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Ice Cream / Pasta & Sauce - When Bonzo doesn't get any of Chef's homemade ice cream, Chef tries to make more with his hand-crank ice cream maker.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep402
programme.desc: The Pickle Family Campout - When all the members of Pickle's family get lost in the woods, Pickle teams up with Tow Truck Blaze to come to their rescue!

programme.title: The Creature Cases S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Mystery on the Monsoon Express - Animal detectives Sam and Kit collect all the clues while searching for the slithering suspect who bit an express train's engineer.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1116
programme.desc: Pups Save the Chicken Conductor / Pups Save the Digi-Tal Stylists - Chickaletta is left driving the train after an enormous chicken floaty launches Ed out the window. // Digi & Tal volunteer at the Pet Parlor. But when they run out of pets to pamper.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1117
programme.desc: Pups Save Fogstock/ Pups Save the Stage Actor - Mayor Humdinger's music festival shakes up Adventure Bay and causes a big mess. // Francois is kicking off a touring production of his play but he is accidentally transported into the woods.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep702
programme.desc: Pups Save the Bubble Monkeys - Ryder and the Pups visit Tracker and Carlos in the jungle, a group of monkeys find themselves in sticky trouble!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep222
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Hotel / The Crew Builds A Hiking Trail - Builder Cove gets its first hotel when Farmer Zoe's cousin Hadley comes to visit. But will Hadley approve of the new hotel?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep223
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Kangaroo Safari / The Crew Plays In The Construction Games - Rubble & Crew build a kangaroo safari for Lucas and Lily right in the Bark Yard... until their kangaroo hops away! // Speed Meister challenges Rubble & Crew to compete in the ultimate build-off:

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Tres Leches Trouble / Wizzle Wozzle Woo - Dora, Boots, and Benny have to trek through the rainforest to deliver a big, delicate tres leches cake to Benny's abuela.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Ice Ice Vola / Do or Diary - Vola trains to become an amazing hockey player in just one day. // Chucks tries to learn everything he can about teen fishies to get closer to his stepsister, Maddie.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Sharkdog's Got Talent - Sharkdog wants to perform in the talent show with Max, but all Max wants to do is chill. Will Sharkdog perform with one of Max's friends instead?

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Meteor Madness - The Sharkpack are excited to watch the meteor shower on Foggy Springs's highest mountain, and Sharkdog knows the best way to get there. The only problem? Captain Quigley thinks she does too.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Pest Friends Forever - Sharkdog has fleas! Sea fleas, that is. Max will do whatever it takes to get rid of them, but that may be tough because Sharkdog is so itchy, he can't sit still!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Mysteries - The family is watching Detective Potato on TV. Peppa and George want to be detectives too. So,Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Bubbles - Peppa and George are playing with bubbles. When the bubble mixture runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make really big bubbles with an old tennis racket and soapy water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Bedtime - Its nearly time for bed and Peppa and George are called in for their bath. After that, they brush their teeth and get into bed. Soon they are fast asleep

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Traffic Jam - Granny and Grandpa Pig have invited Peppa and her family to lunch. On the way, Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig get caught in a long traffic jam, so Grandpa Pig decides to bring the lunch to them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Rock Pools - Granny and Grandpa Pig take Peppa and George to a beach with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. They all have fun with a little crab, a seashell and a fossil.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Teddy's Day Out - Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zo Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When its home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Emily Elephant - There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep210
programme.desc: George's Friend - George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur but they are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun at the playground.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Greedyguts / Where is Bali? - A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep323
programme.desc: Paddington's Adventure Club Cracks The Case! / Paddington And Aunt Lucy's Special Recipe - Paddington and his friends set out to help PC Wells solve the case of the missing Windsor Ruby. // Thanks to Aunt Lucy's Special recipe the Browns set up a takeaway business from their home.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep715
programme.desc: Super Slide Trophy - Blaze and Gasquatch compete to win the Super Slide Trophy! But when they run into problems along the way, Gasquatch knows just how to solve them... with mud!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep521
programme.desc: Pups Save a Cuckoo Clock / Pups Save Ms. Marjorie's House - Jake's family cuckoo clock and is sliding down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep522
programme.desc: Pups Rescue Thanksgiving / Pups Save a Windy Bay - The bouncy turkey from the Thanksgiving feast at City Hall has flown away with Humdinger and his kittens! // A super-strong wind has suddenly swept up all the surfers in the Adventure Bay Windsurfing Race.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Lannie's Lights / Assembly Required - When another fishy tells Lannie that her lantern shark lights are too bright, she tries to dim her shine. // The Sharks order a new table and discover they have to built it themselves.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep222
programme.desc: I'm Not A Barbababy Anymore / Roboxman - No! It's over! Barbidur is no longer a baby, he's a big boy now! // The barbababies are going to the hypermarket for the first time.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Paddington's Race Against the Storm / Paddington's Super Snail - Judy finds her inner hero when a storm hits on a Rangers Camping trip, and they need to shelter from the weather // Paddington befriends a speedy snail, who is so fast she has a heroic future ahead.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The Crew And Skye Build A Mountain Lodge - Skye visits Rubble & Crew from Adventure Bay when their construction project needs some aerial support. But Speed Meister tries to beat the pups to finish the job.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Tres Leches Trouble / Wizzle Wozzle Woo - Dora, Boots, and Benny have to trek through the rainforest to deliver a big, delicate tres leches cake to Benny's abuela.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Royal Rescue - A visit to the King's castle goes awry when the King accidentally catapults himself far, far away!

programme.title: The Creature Cases S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Mystery on the Monsoon Express - Animal detectives Sam and Kit collect all the clues while searching for the slithering suspect who bit an express train's engineer.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Air Sharkdog - When Dennis challenges the Sharkpack to a game of 3-on-3 basketball, Sharkdog reveals he's an amazing player. So amazing, he may end up taking Max's spot!

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Sick as a Sharkdog - When Sharkdog comes down with a mysterious cold, Max knows Dad will be able to help him feel better. But things go haywire when the aquarium's robot doctor takes over the examination!

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep209
programme.desc: The Sharkdog Scoop - When Mom is assigned to investigate Sharkdog's wild side for the news, she realizes there's nothing scary about Max's best friend.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Old Shark Bride / Swimming Solo - Baby gets carried away when he helps Grandma and Grandpa plan their vow renewal ceremony.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep718
programme.desc: Pups Save Little Hairy / Pups Save a Kooky Klimber - Big Hairy's little brother falls into a hole and Tracker gets carried away by Big Hairy. It's time for a Jungle Rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1116
programme.desc: Pups Save the Chicken Conductor - Chickaletta is left driving the train after an enormous chicken floaty launches Ed out the window.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Polly Parrot - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house, and meet their new parrot, Polly.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep152
programme.desc: School Play - Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Polly's Holiday - Granny and Grandpas pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Windy Autumn Day - It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppas ball blows into the pond and Georges hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep172
programme.desc: Everywhere at Once - Anna has prepared her ice cream for everyone but forgets to place it in the freezer. - as she is trying to help all her friends at once, the ice cream melts! Is it ruined or can it be saved?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep173
programme.desc: The Blue Butterfly - Anna and her friends are on a mission to capture a photograph of a pretty flower, but on the search, they see a beautiful blue butterfly.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Ice Cream / Pasta & Sauce - When Bonzo doesn't get any of Chef's homemade ice cream, Chef tries to make more with his hand-crank ice cream maker.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Guacamole - Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep9
programme.desc: The Diary Badge - The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Sea Arch Escape - Xuli's flying race around the Academy inspires cadet Tala to fly the Grimbler. But she crashes into a fragile sea arch that could collapse right on top of her!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Go Jetters Academy: Ghost Crabs - Glitch takes all the sand from the Academy beach, leaving the local crabs with nowhere to hide from hungry seagulls. Can the Go Jetters repair the beach before it's too late?

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Promises - Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mum's word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why it's important not to break them.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Omelette - Bingo is helping Mum make an omelette for Dad's birthday breakfast, but cracking eggs is harder than it looks, and Dad is getting hungrier by the minute.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Born Yesterday - Dad pretends he was born yesterday. Bluey and Bingo have to guide him through his second day on Earth, especially when he discovers food is delicious and steals Lucky's Dad's pie.

programme.desc: Promises - Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mum's word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why it's important not to break them.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Omelette - Bingo is helping Mum make an omelette for Dad's birthday breakfast, but cracking eggs is harder than it looks, and Dad is getting hungrier by the minute.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Born Yesterday - Dad pretends he was born yesterday. Bluey and Bingo have to guide him through his second day on Earth, especially when he discovers food is delicious and steals Lucky's Dad's pie.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep77
programme.desc: Sleepybyes - The Teletubbies say goodnight to the Tiddlytubbies; it is sleepybyes time. But Po isn't tired anymore and goes for a special ride on her scooter.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Hello, Hello (Eh-Oh!) - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing and say "Hello".

programme.desc: Amazing Maze - Hooper builds an amazing fairy tale maze, but his friends get lost in it.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep26

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep16

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep25

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep24

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep37

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep23

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep39

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep2

programme.title: Takhta Dan Amanah: Payung Negeri , Berjiwa Rakyat
programme.desc: Takhta dan Amanah: Payung Negeri, Berjiwa Rakyat adalah program temubual khas bersama Sultan Pahang, Al-Sultan Abdullah Riayatuddin Al-Mustafa Billah Shah sempena Hari Keputeraan baginda pada 30 Julai. Menerusi temubual, Baginda bertitah mengenai pencapaian di negeri Pahang, perkembangan sektor politik, pendidikan, sukan termasuk perkongsian tips kesihatan.

programme.title: Bual Bisnes
programme.desc: Bual Bisnes merupakan sebuah program bual bicara santai dan berinformasi yang meneroka secara mendalam landskap perniagaan tempatan. Setiap episod memberi fokus kepada pelbagai sektor utama Perusahaan Kecil dan Sederhana (PKS) seperti F&B, automotif, kesihatan serta francais. Program ini menampilkan temu bual eksklusif bersama pakar industri, usahawan berjaya dan pemimpin perniagaan, bagi berkongsi pandangan, kisah kejayaan serta amalan terbaik. Matlamat utama Bual Bisnes adalah untuk mendidik penonton tentang peranan penting sektor perniagaan dalam menjana pertumbuhan ekonomi negara.

programme.title: Take Tech
programme.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Sentier, once a bustling garment district, is now home to many Internet start-ups and hosts new restaurants, galleries and boutiques, making it a dynamic hub for trendsetting businesses in Paris.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Hit The Road: Nagasaki
programme.desc: Set out on a journey through Nagasaki-a cultural gateway shaped by tides and time. Wander old streets, then sail to Fukue, where ocean vistas and the quiet harmony of distant cultures await.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: In summer, children gather at the street corners where Jizo statues stand for lively festivities. People pray for the health and success of their children during this cornerstone of faith.

programme.title: Easy Japanese For Work
programme.desc: Today: asking others for favors. Warni Letty Yuhara, from Indonesia, works at a farm in Ibaraki Prefecture. She struggles with others to stay late. To improve, she tackles a roleplay challenge.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Komuro Maito makes dyes from things normally discarded like fruit skins or twigs, but the results are stunning. Colors vary by plant and even by season. As he often says, "trash is treasure."

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Hiroshima'S Tower Of Life
programme.desc: The Hiroshima Red Cross Hospital was one of the only hospitals still standing after the dropping of the atomic bomb. Newly uncovered files shed light on the ensuing weeks and months at the hospital.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Nagasaki: 188 Memories Of The Bomb
programme.desc: Some 76 years after the atomic bomb was unleashed on the city of Nagasaki, NHK and the Nagasaki Atomic Bomb Museum asked survivors to create pictures, preserving their memories for future generations.

programme.title: NHK Hiroshima Theme Song
programme.desc: NHK Hiroshima's theme song by PORNOGRAFFITTI, marking 80 years since the city was atomic bombed. Full of wishes and prayers for peace, it depicts a streetcar that ran three days after the bombing.

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Cycle Around Japan Highlights
programme.desc: Shizuoka has everything from beaches to mountains, but this time our road takes us through its deep forests, from wild rides on timber trails to a wild taste experience in the birthplace of wasabi.

programme.title: Story Land In Classical Japanese
programme.desc: This program presents masterpieces of classical Japanese literature in both their original forms and modern translations, with easy-to-understand imagery that conveys the worldview of ancient Japan.

programme.title: Take Tech
programme.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

programme.title: J-Melo
programme.desc: Join May J. for great Japanese music! This week: cool R&B-rooted J-pop from girl duo Natsudaidai; and EDM-influenced rock from THE SIXTH LIE. Both acts are in the J-MELO studio to chat and perform.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-18.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at the significance of cats in Japan.

programme.title: A Cat'S-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: In Tokyo's romantic Kagurazaka district, watch Noh rehearsals with a kitty named Torakichi. Then, follow an alley cat to a popular coffee shop before enjoying geisha shamisen performances after dark.

programme.title: A Cat'S-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: In Tokyo's romantic Kagurazaka district, watch Noh rehearsals with a kitty named Torakichi. Then, follow an alley cat to a popular coffee shop before enjoying geisha shamisen performances after dark.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Sentier, once a bustling garment district, is now home to many Internet start-ups and hosts new restaurants, galleries and boutiques, making it a dynamic hub for trendsetting businesses in Paris.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Hit The Road: Nagasaki
programme.desc: Set out on a journey through Nagasaki-a cultural gateway shaped by tides and time. Wander old streets, then sail to Fukue, where ocean vistas and the quiet harmony of distant cultures await.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: In summer, children gather at the street corners where Jizo statues stand for lively festivities. People pray for the health and success of their children during this cornerstone of faith.

programme.title: Easy Japanese For Work
programme.desc: Today: asking others for favors. Warni Letty Yuhara, from Indonesia, works at a farm in Ibaraki Prefecture. She struggles with others to stay late. To improve, she tackles a roleplay challenge.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Komuro Maito makes dyes from things normally discarded like fruit skins or twigs, but the results are stunning. Colors vary by plant and even by season. As he often says, "trash is treasure."

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Hiroshima'S Tower Of Life
programme.desc: The Hiroshima Red Cross Hospital was one of the only hospitals still standing after the dropping of the atomic bomb. Newly uncovered files shed light on the ensuing weeks and months at the hospital.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Nagasaki: 188 Memories Of The Bomb
programme.desc: Some 76 years after the atomic bomb was unleashed on the city of Nagasaki, NHK and the Nagasaki Atomic Bomb Museum asked survivors to create pictures, preserving their memories for future generations.

programme.title: NHK Hiroshima Theme Song
programme.desc: NHK Hiroshima's theme song by PORNOGRAFFITTI, marking 80 years since the city was atomic bombed. Full of wishes and prayers for peace, it depicts a streetcar that ran three days after the bombing.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Cycle Around Japan Highlights
programme.desc: Shizuoka has everything from beaches to mountains, but this time our road takes us through its deep forests, from wild rides on timber trails to a wild taste experience in the birthplace of wasabi.

programme.title: Story Land In Classical Japanese
programme.desc: This program presents masterpieces of classical Japanese literature in both their original forms and modern translations, with easy-to-understand imagery that conveys the worldview of ancient Japan.

programme.title: Take Tech
programme.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: J-Melo
programme.desc: Join May J. for great Japanese music! This week: cool R&B-rooted J-pop from girl duo Natsudaidai; and EDM-influenced rock from THE SIXTH LIE. Both acts are in the J-MELO studio to chat and perform.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-18.

programme.title: Tradition Inspires A Green Future
programme.desc: Aditya Sharma seeks a sustainable balance between protecting the planet and meeting consumer demand for clothing. He explores a Japanese tradition in the hopes of finding inspiration.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: The pianist Sumino Hayato is winning international acclaim for a style that blends various genres, while remaining rooted in classical music. He tells us what he hopes to communicate through his art.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We follow a Ukrainian music duo performing in Nagasaki's Sasebo City formed by Alek Pashkowski and Vadym Bezvuliak, as well as Spanish-born Anna Fornieles Orti who runs a pottery school in Osaka.

programme.title: Easy Travel Japanese
programme.desc: #1 Ii desu ka? May I?/ When traveling in Japan for the first time, what phrases do you need? 4 episodes (3 minutes each) provide simple expressions you can put to use as soon as you land.

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: Kaizoku: Nii Oshima Island
programme.desc: The Murakami Kaizoku were seafarers and fighters in the Seto Inland Sea. We explore their history and legacy, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time, Nii Oshima Island.

programme.title: Bosai:#7 Mt.Fuji'S Threat To Tokyo
programme.desc: Mt. Fuji is known for its repeated eruptions. After 300 years of silence, we can expect another eruption that could cause major damage to Tokyo. Learn how to protect yourself from volcanic disasters.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

programme.title: Culture Crossroads Bosai Series
programme.desc: As a series in Culture Crossroads, BOSAI: BE PREPARED provides practical knowledge to save yourself from natural disaster. In this episode, we learn how to evacuate from flood and rainstorm.

programme.desc: #41 Can we buy tickets? / To ask someone if you can do something, say the verb to indicate your desired action, followed by "koto ga" and "dekimasu," meaning something is possible. Then add "ka."

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep9

Themes range from hot current affair issues at home and abroad, to diverse topics of social, historical and cultural interests.

programme.title: Phoenix Midday Express S1
programme.desc: Presenting the most update international and financial news breaking before lunch, viewers can turn it to stay informed about events happening around the world.

programme.title: Phoenix Weather Forecast S1
programme.desc: Phoenixs engaging young presenter tracks weather movements and forecasts upcoming conditions in her upbeat, lively presentation coupled with music, folklore and traditional wisdom pertaining to different weather conditions in various times of the year, making Weather Forecast a true delight regardless of rain or shine.

programme.title: Under the power S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Lu Yi, a cold and elite officer of the Ming Dynastys secret police, the Jinyiwei, crosses paths with Yuan Jin Xia, a sharp and tomboyish officer from the Police's 6th Division. Initially clashing over cases, theyre forced to work together when assigned to investigate missing river repair funds. As they unravel a conspiracy involving high-ranking officials, their mutual animosity gradually transforms into friendship and love.

programme.title: Infinity and Beyond S1 Ep8
programme.desc: In 2022, to celebrate the 25th anniversary of Hong Kong's return to China, Mango TV and TVB decided to produce a music program. There are 16 singers from either Hong Kong or China who love Hong Kong's music/cantopop. The 16 singers are separated into two teams: men and women team.

programme.title: Redeeming Love S1 Ep5
programme.desc: After losing her closest family, Jiang Tong makes a powerful comeback, determined to expose hidden crimes and take down the mastermind. Initially clashing over cases, theyre forced to work together when assigned to investigate missing river repair funds. As they unravel a conspiracy involving high-ranking officials, their mutual animosity gradually transforms into friendship and love.

programme.title: Infinity and Beyond S1 Ep11
programme.desc: In 2022, to celebrate the 25th anniversary of Hong Kong's return to China, Mango TV and TVB decided to produce a music program. There are 16 singers from either Hong Kong or China who love Hong Kong's music/cantopop. The 16 singers are separated into two teams: men and women team.

programme.title: Redeeming Love S1 Ep9
programme.desc: After losing her closest family, Jiang Tong makes a powerful comeback, determined to expose hidden crimes and take down the mastermind. Along the way, she becomes entangled in a passionate struggle with her former love, Gao Xiu Yu, while her return brings about new fates for those from her past.

programme.title: Sherlock S1 Ep10
programme.desc: It is the first female-centric "puzzle-solving" show. The show explores workplace issues faced by women. The show features a legal education segment with a lawyer expert at the end of each episode.
